### Self-Check Checklist

Before requesting review, verify:

- [ ] **Style:** Pixar/DreamWorks 3D animated aesthetic (NOT realistic)
- [ ] **Characters:** Match reference designs with identifying features
- [ ] **Resolution:** Minimum 1024px width
- [ ] **Aspect Ratio:** Correct for asset type (16:9 storyboards, 1:1 portraits)
- [ ] **Continuity:** Consistent with adjacent scenes/approved assets
- [ ] **Family-Friendly:** Appropriate for ages 6+
